items.sentence: Tom said Mary wasn\'t planning to do that on her own.
Tom says he goes jogging at least three times a week.
We closed the restaurant three hours early yesterday.
Tom\'s father, who is in prison, never writes to him.
I\'m sure Tom will do that for you if you ask him to.
I get the feeling you don\'t really want me to drive.
I hadn\'t intended to work at this company this long.
If I\'d wanted your advice, I would\'ve asked for it.
I\'m pretty sure Tom knows what he\'s supposed to do.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom didn\'t eat all his dinner.
